purpose: Enable employees to request company-approved devices through a self-service Power App, triggering approval workflows and integrating with internal policies.

mvp_components.app_details: A self-service app for employees to browse and request devices.

app_screens.screen_details: Allows users to browse available devices, view specs, photos, and availability, and filter by department-approved models.
Form for selecting a device, justifying business need, selecting urgency level, and auto-populating employee details from Azure AD.

mvp_components.flow_details: Workflow for managing the approval process of device requests.

flow_actions.action_details: Sends a notification to the manager when a new request is submitted.
Allows the manager to approve or reject the request with comments within a 2 business day SLA.

post_mvp_modules.details: A new screen to allow employees to view the status of their requests and receive email notifications at each step. An optional Power BI dashboard for tracking can also be included.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Extend the existing CanvasApp to include a new screen for request tracking. This will provide a seamless experience for the user. Additionally, a Power BI dashboard should be considered for detailed tracking and reporting purposes.

post_mvp_modules.details: Enhance the workflow to allow IT Administrators to update stock levels and mark orders as fulfilled. Integrate with an external procurement system like SAP for inventory management.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Use Power Automate to extend the existing workflow, ensuring that stock levels are updated in real-time and orders are marked as fulfilled efficiently. Integration with an external system like SAP will require a secure and reliable connection, possibly using a custom connector if a standard one is not available.

integration_points: Integration with Azure AD for auto-populating employee details
Post-MVP integration with procurement system (e.g., SAP)
notes: The MVP focuses on the core functionality of device ordering and approval. Post-MVP features will enhance the system with tracking and inventory management capabilities.
